parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: One of the following principal axes: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: An array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of Axis

parameters.name: AutoCorrect
parameters.description: True to generate orthogonal axes, false to not

title: IMassPropertyOverrideOptions.SetOverridePrincipalAxesOrientation
description: Overrides the orientation of the specified principal axis of inertia of the model currently being edited.
signature:
System.Boolean SetOverridePrincipalAxesOrientation( 
   System.Int32
Axis
,
   System.Object
Value
,
   System.Boolean
AutoCorrect
)

parameters.name: Axis
parameters.description: One of the following principal axes: 0 = X axis 1 = Y axis 2 = Z axis

parameters.name: Value
parameters.description: An array of three doubles of the x, y, and z coordinates of Axis

parameters.name: AutoCorrect
parameters.description: True to generate orthogonal axes, false to not

returns: True if the principal axis orientation successfully overridden, false if not
remarks:
This method is valid only if
IMassPropertyOverrideOptions::OverrideMomentsOfInertia
is set to true.
